price: Iyyiti cimtuun dhugaadhaan isaan qabatte, hoomacha isaan goone, Ummatoota miidhaa hojjattootaaf (rahmata Rabbii irraa) fageenyi haa ta’u.
arabic: فَأَخَذَتۡهُمُ ٱلصَّيۡحَةُ بِٱلۡحَقِّ فَجَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ غُثَآءٗۚ فَبُعۡدٗا لِّلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fa-akhadhathumu al-ṣayḥatu bil-ḥaqi fajaʿalnāhum ghuthāan fabuʿ'dan lil'qawmi al-ẓālimīna
